This Shiny app was developed for the *Capstone Project* of the 
[Johns Hopkins Coursera Data Science 
Specialization](https://www.coursera.org/specialization/jhudatascience/1?utm_medium=listingPage).

###  How to use this application?

1 Simply, enter a phrase in the text box input.

2 Use the slider to select the number of words to be predicted.

In the "Prediction" tab, the highest probable prediction will appear in red and the remaining predicted words will appear below.
